Waking at 1am two nights in a row, restless garbage sleep when you do drift back—that's not a willpower problem, that's your nervous system on high alert and it doesn't know how to power down. When your heart is racing like that and your body's wired, trying to "calm down" or think your way out usually backfires because you're fighting your physiology. When you feel that wired, heart-racing activation, go splash cold water on your face or hold an ice cube for 30 seconds.
